Texts.Chs: <译文： 坩埚起作用了！它起作用了！最后我终于解开了量子之谜的最后一块。现在它直接从宇宙流中吸取^red;<未知>^reset;的信息，并将^red;<未知>^reset;应用于^red;<未知>^reset;。我们的武器和装甲现在是无与伦比的。赞美霸权！>
Texts.Eng: <Translation: The Crucible works! It works! At long last I have unravelled the final piece of the quantum puzzle. It now siphons ^red;<unknown>^reset; directly from the cosmic stream and applies ^red;<unknown>^reset; to the ^red;<unknown>^reset;. Our weapons and armor are now unmatched. The Hegemony be praised!>
